iucn categori ii (nation park) hoodoo rock format locat bill counti &amp; mckenzi county, north dakota, usa nearest&#160;c medora coordin 46°58′n 103°27′w﻿ / ﻿46.967°n 103.450°w﻿ / 46.967; -103.450coordinates: 46°58′n 103°27′w﻿ / ﻿46.967°n 103.450°w﻿ / 46.967; -103.450 area 70,446 acr (110.072&#160;sq&#160;mi; 28,508&#160;ha; 285.08&#160;km2)[1] establish november&#160;10,&#160;1978&#160;(1978-november-10) visitor 563,407 (in&#160;2011)[2] governing&#160;bodi nation park servic theodor roosevelt nation park unit state nation park compris three geograph separ area badland western north dakota. park name u.s. presid theodor roosevelt. park cover 70,446 acr (110.072&#160;sq&#160;mi; 28,508&#160;ha; 285.08&#160;km2) land three sections: north unit, south unit, elkhorn ranch unit. park' larger south unit lie alongsid interst 94 near medora, north dakota. smaller north unit situat 80&#160;mi (130&#160;km) north south unit, u.s. highway 85, south watford city, north dakota. roosevelt' elkhorn ranch locat north south units, approxim 20&#160;mi (32&#160;km) west us 85 fairfield, north dakota. littl missouri river flow three unit park. maah daah hey trail connect three units. content 1 histori 1.1 roosevelt connect 1.2 park develop 2 attract 3 galleri 4 see also 5 note 6 extern link history[edit] roosevelt connection[edit] roosevelt first came north dakota badland hunt bison septemb 1883. first short trip, got bison fell love rug lifestyl "perfect freedom" west. invest $14,000 maltes cross ranch, alreadi manag sylvan ferri bill merrifield seven mile south medora. winter, ferri merrifield built maltes cross cabin. death wife mother februari 14, 1884, teddi roosevelt return north dakota ranch seek solitud time heal. summer, start second ranch, elkhorn ranch, 35 mile north medora, hire two main woodsmen, bill sewal wilmot dow, operate. teddi roosevelt took great interest ranch hunt west, detail experi piec publish eastern newspap magazines. wrote three major work life west: "ranch life hunt trail," "hunt trip ranchman," "the wilder hunter." adventur "the strenuou life" outdoor loss cattl starvat winter 1886-1887 influenti theodor roosevelt' pursuit conserv polici presid unit state (1901–1909). park development[edit] follow theodor roosevelt' death 1919, littl missouri badland explor determin possibl park sites. civilian conserv corp camp establish futur park unit 1934 1941, develop road structur use today. area design roosevelt recreat demonstr area 1935. 1946 transfer unit state fish wildlif servic theodor roosevelt nation wildlif refuge. presid truman establish theodor roosevelt nation memori park april 25, 1947, nation memori park ever established. 1978, addit boundari adjust establish 29,920 acr (121.1&#160;km2) theodor roosevelt wilderness, park' design chang theodor roosevelt nation park. attractions[edit] cannonbal concretions[3] north unit main unit park scenic drives, approxim 100 mile foot hors trails, wildlif viewing, opportun back countri hike camping. three develop campgrounds: junip campground north unit, cottonwood campground south unit, roundup group hors campground south unit. one popular attract wildlif viewing. park home wide varieti great plain wildlif includ bison, mountain lion, feral horses, elk, bighorn sheep, white-tail deer mule deer, prairi dogs, least 186 speci bird includ golden eagles, sharp-tail grouse, wild turkeys. bison may danger visitor advis view distance. bison, elk, bighorn sheep success reintroduc park. sceneri chang constantli relationship seasons. brown, dormant grass domin late summer winter, explod green color earli summer along hundr speci flower plants. winter beauti scene snow cover sharp terrain badland lock park theodor roosevelt call "an abod iron desolation." theodor roosevelt' maltes cross cabin badland import theodor roosevelt' life, park memori contribut conserv america' natur resources. museum south unit visitor center provid background theodor roosevelt ranch days. roosevelt' maltes cross cabin open public view year-round south unit visitor center. roosevelt' elkhorn ranch remot area park, 35 mile north medora, access gravel roads. check park ranger road condit rout travel site. foundat ranch hous shop build preserved, though portion cabin remov re-purpos roosevelt vacat ranch. threat elkhorn ranch site includ oil develop adjac lands, particularli visual intrus nois pollut oil facil traffic. park popular back countri hike horseback riding. permit back countri camp may obtain south unit north unit visitor centers. 100 mile trail make fine hike park, though water shade limit along trails. park unit mostli surround forest servic grasslands. area dark night sky excel star gaze occasion northern lights. entir park surround 7-foot (2.1&#160;m) tall woven wire fenc keep bison feral hors insid park commerci livestock out. anim abl pass over, under, fenc specif locat provid purpose. town medora, entranc south unit, provid touristi western experience, wooden plank sidewalks, old fashion ice cream parlors, buggi rides. sever museum burn hill amphitheath nightli product "medora musical" earli june earli september. park offici manag popul bison, horses, elk maintain balanc ecosystem. biologist also monitor prairi dog towns, though park control popul instanc pose threat build human health. gallery[edit] nokota hors badland winter night nakota hors corral bison see also[edit] badland elkhorn ranch maltes cross cabin nokota hors notes[edit] ^ "list acreag decemb 31, 2011". land resourc division, nation park service. retriev 2012-05-13.&#160; ^ "np annual recreat visit report". nation park service. retriev 2012-05-13.&#160; ^ "theodor roosevelt nation park north unit scenic byway". retriev 2012-05-13.&#160; extern links[edit] find theodor roosevelt nation park wikipedia' sister project media common travel guid wikivoyag offici theodor roosevelt nation
